instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message: touch bar is display image but touch is not working, i change touch bar but its still not workin propely , still i got image but touch is not working

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message:
Did you try PRAM reset and DFU revive?
Any history available?
Possibly knocked off components.

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message: can't make Pram reset.., it's not working. all components looks ok nothing get off i think

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message:
You must check signals and voltage related with J5100.
Start with pins 2, 18, 20, 21, 22.

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message: L5199 conduct i got 5,14 on 1 and on 2 voltage go down

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message: And you don't want to change it???

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message: ok i change it and its working now. thanks

threads.title: 820-01814 touch bar problem
threads.message:
Be aware of this issue!
Conductivity of a "cold" coil is not the perfect test.
When the power is applied, it gets open because is broken in fact.
